name: bolt-strike
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user charges its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user charges its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis.
